message.body: Hey dan, sorry school started for me this week too and I've been getting vertigo. It's been a rough week! But I got Janine's email, and Ella would like to come to the party, I will email you for deets
Hey Dan, any chance Ella could hang with u guys for an hour today? I am going to see a doctor in west Philly o
Ok, but we won't be home till 4
My appointment is at 4:30, that would be perfect, just hit me up when u are home. Thanks so much!
We're home
Oh cool, we will head up in a moment
Hey I'm out front!
Hey meg. We're pretty sure we have a ride for you guys
Oh that is awesome!
Any chance you are picking up Ella after school tomorrow?
I'm not, her dad is getting her and I think she is taking the bus home. Sorry
Ok. I have a crunch and need a ride home for amara
Oh bummer, let me check with him to see what he is doing tomorrow..I will let u know if we can help you out!
I have a sitter. But she doesn't have a car. A ride is fine, but it would also be a huge help if amara had someone to wait with her for 20 minutes at Powel
Hey Dan, Ella doesn't feel up for the hike, she's been feeling run down this week. Could u pass it on to Janine? I don't have her number in my new phone
Hey Dan, the kids have school, right?
No school
Hey meg. What are you doing with Ella tomorrow?
Hey, she's going to school with me and hanging out in the lounge with my friend during my class, and her dad is picking her up at some point.
Hey Dan, just confirming you Are getting Ella?
Yep
Ok cool, thanks again!
Hey Dan, any chance you can take Ella home with you tomorrow? I have class until four and my baby sitter just called in sick
I have a tentative assignment. I can't commit, but I may know by 2 tomorrow
That would be cool, just doing a check around, thanks!
My babysitter just called in sick (again), any chance you can grab Ella from school? I get out of class at four
We can do that.
Oh awesome, thanks! I will call the school
Ok. Bang on our window
Phone might die, almost there!
Any chance you are around. I have an assignment and need to run
We are at Powell, waiting for Ella's conference...
